name: Rocket Run
description:
Rocket Run is a retro-styled control and shoot game in the style of 'Gravitar' and 'Thrust'.

Thrust and steer your way around 6 levels collecting artefacts, destroying enemies and avoiding space mines.

Power-ups can be found along the way to refuel and recharge your ship.

Find the landing pad and set your ship down to finish each level.

Controls:
W - Thrust
A - Rotate Left
D - Rotate Right
SPACE - Shoot
Q - Quit

ESC - Exit game (from menu screen)

Thanks for playing!
